page.title: 15PUBLIC TRANSPORT SURVEY.
page.content: One Thursday afternoon in July we questioned people at the bus-station in Wisbech. Most passengers were travelling to nearby villages.Others were going to towns such as Kings Lynn,Ely,March and Long Sutton.The people with the longest journeys to make were going to Great Yarmouth and London. Passengers were asked the following questions: 1.How long have you been waiting? LESS THAN 10MINS. 50% LESS THAN 30MINS. 25% MORE THAN 30MINS. 25% 2.How long will your journey be? LESS THAN 10MINS. 0.4% LESS THAN 30MINS. 50% MORE THAN 30MINS. 49.6% 3.How often do you use public transport? MORE THAN ONCE A DAY. 0.4%
